content.question: What is the electric potential at location <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math> due to the two point charges located along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis as shown?
